attributes.action: Refuse to honour John Prescott, former Deputy Prime Minister, with a Knighthood or peerage at anytime in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He has brought disgrace on Parliament, his own political party and our country. It would probably be an embarrassment for the Queen to have to honour this person and he must never be allowed to represent this country again. He is not deserving of any further recognition. Any form of honour would send all the wrong messages about the sort of behaviour we the electorate expect from our policitians.
